486960.name: Meridian: Squad 22 - Soundtrack
486960.description:
Includes all 31 mp3 tracks from the Meridian: Squad 22 Original Soundtrack.

Track Listing

Track 1 - Moment of Silence
Track 2 - Threat Lurking
Track 3 - Dark Clouds
Track 4 - Fate
Track 5 - Meridian Vista
Track 6 - Unknown Waters
Track 7 - What brought us here
Track 8 - Horizon
Track 9 - Fragile Peace
Track 10 - Vigilant
Track 11 - Light Encounter
Track 12 - Invasion
Track 13 - Tactical
Track 14 - Adrenaline
Track 15 - Desperate Fight
Track 16 - Target in Sight
Track 17 - Forgotten Battle
Track 18 - Survival
Track 19 - Intense Anger
Track 20 - Strike
Track 21 - City of Hope
Track 22 - Defending
Track 23 - Earth 3023
Track 24 - CCS Raptor
Track 25 - Skeleborg Incursion
Track 26 - Squad 22
Track 27 - Donovan's Lab
Track 28 - The Outpost
Track 29 - Assassination
Track 30 - Jonas Fleeing
Track 31 - Going Home (End Credits)

Songs will be placed in your Meridian: Squad 22 folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Meridian - Squad 22\Soundtrack

Once downloaded, you can go to Library > Music > Meridian: Squad 22 OST to play the album in your Steam client.
